numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The title is "The extent of optimism of each generation".
3. No generation thinks that the world is getting better.
4. The graph shows that younger people are more optimistic about the world than older people.
5. Some points in the graph show that older people are optimistic.
6. The average figure shows that younger people are more optimistic than older people.
8. These factors make the distribution different among countries.
9. The figures are not concentrated on one side.
10. The figures vary widely across all generations.
13. I belong to the younger generation.
15. The younger generation will change the world over time.
